mapper.insert: insert into member (id, username, birth_date, password, gender, u_tel, email, created_at, user_type, nickname, u_address, diary_private, warning_count, state_code, file_no) values(#{id}, #{username}, #{birthDate}, #{password}, #{gender}, #{uTel}, #{email}, NOW() , 'USER' , #{nickname}, #{uAddress}, #{diaryPrivate}, 0, 1, #{fileNo})

insert into member (id, username, birth_date, password, gender, u_tel, email, created_at, user_type, major, h_no, state_code, file_no) values(#{id}, #{username}, #{birthDate}, #{password}, #{gender}, #{uTel}, #{email}, NOW(), #{userType}, #{major}, #{hNo}, 1, #{fileNo})
mapper.select: select * from member where id = #{userId} and email = #{email}
mapper.update: update member set password = #{password} where id = #{userId}
mapper.select: select password from member where id = #{userId}
select u_no as userNo, password from member where id = #{userId}
select nickname, u_no from member where u_no = #{u_no}
select username, nickname, id, u_address, email, birth_date, gender, diary_private, u_tel from member where u_no = #{uNo}

select m.u_no, m.id, m.username, m.nickname, m.u_address, m.email, m.u_tel, m.diary_private, f.file_no, f.file_name, f.file_path, f.file_category from member m left JOIN file f ON m.file_no = f.file_no where m.u_no = #{uNo}
select password from member where u_no = #{uNo}

select count(*) from member m where h_no=#{hNo} and state_code=1

select * ,count(r.r_no) as resCount from member m left join reservation r using (h_no) left join file f using (file_no) where m.h_no=#{hNo} and m.state_code=1 group by m.u_no, m.h_no order by resCount desc
